channel.title: Data analytics portfolio on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Data analytics portfolio on Homepage

item.title: Visualization III : Power supply in India
item.description: Power supply in India The electricity generation target of conventional sources for the year 2021-22 has been fixed as 1356 Billion Units (BU), i.e., growth of around 9.83% over an actual conventional generation of 1234.608 BU for the previous year (2020-21). Let’s see how the requirements and availability, and distribution of power have changed in India in the last 12 years. I have used the data available on the website of Ministry of power.

item.title: Visualization II : Pfizer's market capitalization
item.description: Gaviâ€™s COVAX Advance Market Commitment On 10 June, 2021 President Joe Biden announced that United States will donate 500 million Pfizer vaccines to 92 low- and lower middle-income countries and economies. The vaccine maker Pfizer has got the order from the government. The pandemic has been profitable for the pharma sector and Pfizer has also added huge amounts to its valuation. It would be interesting to compare the market value of Pfizer with the GDP of countries that will be getting the benefits of free vaccines by U.

item.title: Visualization I : Fortune 500
item.description: The Fortune 500 When it comes to market capitalization/value the top 4-5 companies on the list of Fortune 500 hold a significant share in the market. For studying this I have gathered data from the official website of Fortune. After that I have used Power BI for making visualization, that shows the market value of top 25 Fortune 500 companies for 2021. Top 25 companies as per market value From the visualizations we can observe that the top 4 companies Apple, Microsoft, Amazon, Alphabet(Google) have a combined market share of nearly 46% of the total market capitalization of top 25 companies.

item.title: Project II: The G.O.A.T keeper debate!
item.description: DIFFERENT STYLES OF GOALKEEPING I have studied the style of playing of German goalkeeper Manuel Neuer and English goalkeeper Jordan Pickford. I have taken the data from their matches in the World cup 2018. The visualizations represents the passes(circles) made by these keepers and the direction(arrows) in which these passes were executed. Passes made by Jordan Pickford Passes made by Manuel Neuer Key observations

item.title: Project I: Impact of data analytics on FOOTBALL
item.description: DATA ANALYTICS IN FOOTBALL In this project I’m trying to show how data analytics has changed the approach of players in taking attempts on goal. This is the “expected goals model” (a product of data analytics), which essentially tells us what are the probabilities of goal being scored from a certain area on the field. The expected goals curve I have taken data from La Liga season 2006-07 and 2018-19
